content.title: Run the App
content.body:
1. From the left navigation bar, click Run.
    It will take some time for Iris to display the Live Preview is ready window.
    The Iris Preview window launches your application.
  2. Enter the following login credentials in your app.
    • Username: john.doe@woodburn.com
    • Password: VoltMX@123
  3. Click Login.
    The account list appears.
  4. Click the Recipients tab.
    The recipient list appears.
  5. Click the add (+) icon to add a recipient.
  6. Select a recipient from the list to view their details.
    From the details page, you can delete the recipient.
    You will learn how to edit recipients in next hike.
  7. Click the logout button on top of the screen to navigate to the login screen.
